value.string:
selection
 selection_domain
 selection_report
 getUid
 where_expression
 omit_input
 omit_output
 resource_uid:list
 from_date
 to_date
 at_date
 transaction_simulation_state:list
 transaction_section_category

<dtml-if getUid>
 SELECT
 DISTINCT transaction.uid, transaction.path,
 transaction_line.path as current_transaction_line_path,
 transaction.title as transaction_title,
 destination_section.title AS third_party,
 IF(stock.quantity > 0, stock.quantity, 0.0) AS source_debit,
 IF(stock.quantity < 0, - stock.quantity, 0.0) AS source_credit,
 stock.quantity AS source_balance
 FROM
 movement,
 stock
 LEFT JOIN catalog AS destination_section 
 ON destination_section.uid = stock.mirror_section_uid
 AND stock.node_uid = <dtml-var getUid>,
 
 catalog,
 catalog AS transaction_line,
 catalog AS transaction,
 catalog AS section_c,
 catalog AS section_bc,
 category AS section_membership,
 catalog AS section
 <dtml-if selection_domain>, <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlJoinExpression()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>, <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlJoinExpression()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if where_expression>, category </dtml-if>
 
 WHERE stock.node_uid = <dtml-var getUid>
 AND transaction_line.uid = stock.uid 
 AND transaction_line.parent_uid = transaction.uid
 AND catalog.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND movement.uid = stock.uid
 AND movement.is_accountable = 1
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 movement.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND movement.stop_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND movement.stop_date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND movement.stop_date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.quantity < 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.quantity > 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in transaction_simulation_state>
 transaction.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND transaction.simulation_state != 'cancelled'
 AND transaction.simulation_state != 'draft' 
 </dtml-if>
 AND section.uid = stock.section_uid
 <dtml-if transaction_section_category>
 AND section_c.relative_url = <dtml-sqlvar transaction_section_category type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 AND section_membership.category_uid = section_c.uid
 AND section_membership.base_category_uid = section_bc.uid
 AND section_membership.uid = section.uid
 <dtml-if where_expression>
 AND catalog.uid = category.uid
 AND <dtml-var where_expression>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlExpression()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlExpression(strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 ORDER BY
 stop_date, transaction_line.uid
 </dtml-if>

<dtml-if getUid>
 SELECT
 DISTINCT transaction.uid, transaction.path,
 transaction_line.path as current_transaction_line_path,
 transaction.title as transaction_title,
 destination_section.title AS third_party,
 IF(stock.quantity > 0, stock.quantity, 0.0) AS source_debit,
 IF(stock.quantity < 0, - stock.quantity, 0.0) AS source_credit,
 stock.quantity AS source_balance
 FROM
 movement,
 stock
 LEFT JOIN catalog AS destination_section 
 ON destination_section.uid = stock.mirror_section_uid
 AND stock.node_uid = <dtml-var getUid>,
 
 catalog,
 catalog AS transaction_line,
 catalog AS transaction,
 catalog AS section_c,
 catalog AS section_bc,
 category AS section_membership,
 catalog AS section
 <dtml-if selection_domain>, <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlJoinExpression()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>, <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlJoinExpression()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if where_expression>, category </dtml-if>
 
 WHERE stock.node_uid = <dtml-var getUid>
 AND transaction_line.uid = stock.uid 
 AND transaction_line.parent_uid = transaction.uid
 AND catalog.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND movement.uid = stock.uid
 AND movement.is_accountable = 1
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 movement.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND movement.stop_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND movement.stop_date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND movement.stop_date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.quantity < 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.quantity > 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in transaction_simulation_state>
 transaction.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string"><dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND transaction.simulation_state != 'cancelled'
 AND transaction.simulation_state != 'draft' 
 </dtml-if>
 AND section.uid = stock.section_uid
 <dtml-if transaction_section_category>
 AND section_c.relative_url = <dtml-sqlvar transaction_section_category type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 AND section_membership.category_uid = section_c.uid
 AND section_membership.base_category_uid = section_bc.uid
 AND section_membership.uid = section.uid
 <dtml-if where_expression>
 AND catalog.uid = category.uid
 AND <dtml-var where_expression>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlExpression()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlExpression(strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 ORDER BY
 stop_date, transaction_line.uid
 </dtml-if>
